entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
